Package com.egodoy.alten.challenge.utils.validator

Class ReservationDTOValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.egodoy.alten.challenge.utils.validator.ReservationDTOValidator
  • public class ReservationDTOValidator
extends java.lang.Object
    Validator Class that handle date validations to avoid bad data to be persisted

      • validateReservationDto

        public static boolean validateReservationDto​(BookingDTO reservationDTO)
                                      throws AltenChallengeException
        This method validates if the provided reservation object contains the appropriate date data for booking reservation
        Parameters:
        reservationDTO - object containing reservation related details
        Returns:
        TRUE if everything goes well
        Throws:
        AltenChallengeException - If validations fail

        Parameters:

      • validateFromToDates

        public static boolean validateFromToDates​(java.time.LocalDate from,
                                          java.time.LocalDate to)
                                   throws AltenChallengeException
        Generic Date validations around the allowed queries that the system supports
        Parameters:
        from - Beginning of stay date, it might be for booking or searching availability
        to - Ending of the stay date, it might be for booking or searching availability
        Returns:
        TRUE if everything goes well
        Throws:
        AltenChallengeException - if Validation fail
